fec31608-db04-4af4-9b83-1d86442480fd.name: Money Transfer - Display success screen
fec31608-db04-4af4-9b83-1d86442480fd.description: Script to display success screen to user
fec31608-db04-4af4-9b83-1d86442480fd.script:
"try{ function validateInput() { return String( "function go(obs) { \n" + " const message = document.getElementById('message'); \n" + " if (message) { \n" + " var divSection = document.createElement('div'); \n" + " divSection.id = 'successPage'; \n" + " message.insertBefore(divSection, message.nextSibling); \n" + " divSection.innerHTML = \n" + " `\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "
`;\n" + " var heading = document.createElement('h3'); \n" + " heading.innerText = 'Transfer Successful';\n" + " heading.style.marginTop = '5%';\n" + " divSection.appendChild(heading); \n" + " }\n" + "}\n" + "go();\n" ); } var from = nodeState.get("From"); var to = nodeState.get("To"); var amount = parseFloat(nodeState.get("Amount") || 0).toFixed(2); var currency = nodeState.get("currency"); if (callbacks.isEmpty()) { callbacksBuilder.scriptTextOutputCallback(validateInput()); callbacksBuilder.textOutputCallback(0, " "); callbacksBuilder.textOutputCallback(0, `Payment of ${currency}${amount} was made from ${from} to ${to}.`); } action.goTo("true"); } catch (e) { // User-friendly error message nodeState.putShared("errorMessage", "An error has occurred. Contact support."); // Detailed error information for debugging nodeState.putShared("errorDetails", e.toString()); // Go to Error action.goTo("Error"); }"

9bca5165-3ba2-4ba5-ab5f-a90ebf6fd56b.name: Money Transfer - Display payment error screen

9bca5165-3ba2-4ba5-ab5f-a90ebf6fd56b.script:
"try { function validateInput() { return String( "function go(obs) { \n" + " const message = document.getElementById('message'); \n" + " if (message) { \n" + " var divSection = document.createElement('div'); \n" + " divSection.id = 'errorPage'; \n" + " message.insertBefore(divSection, message.nextSibling); \n" + " divSection.innerHTML = \n" + " `\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "
`;\n" + " var heading = document.createElement('h3'); \n" + " heading.innerText = 'Transfer Error';\n" + " heading.style.marginTop = '5%';\n" + " divSection.appendChild(heading); \n" + " }\n" + "}\n" + "go();\n" ); } if (callbacks.isEmpty()) { callbacksBuilder.scriptTextOutputCallback(validateInput()); callbacksBuilder.textOutputCallback(0, " "); callbacksBuilder.textOutputCallback(0, "Your transfer failed."); } action.goTo("true"); } catch (e) { // User-friendly error message nodeState.putShared("errorMessage", "An error has occurred. Contact support."); // Detailed error information for debugging nodeState.putShared("errorDetails", e.toString()); // Go to Error action.goTo("Error"); }"

57479cf3-e75b-4a94-9b35-3c02aeefad6a.name: Money Transfer - Initialize Variables
57479cf3-e75b-4a94-9b35-3c02aeefad6a.description: Script to Initialize variables that will be used further in the Journey
57479cf3-e75b-4a94-9b35-3c02aeefad6a.script:
"/*
  - Data made available by nodes that have already executed are available in the sharedState variable.
  - The script should set outcome to either "true" or "false".
 */

/* Prerequisites for this Journey Pack
       -Create following custom attributes before proceeding:
           1. custom_emailVerified - string (To keep track that user has verified their emailAddress)
           2. custom_protectActivityCity - string (User's P1 Protect Activity City, used in notification template)
           3. custom_protectActivityState - string (User's P1 Protect Activity City, used in notification template)
           4. custom_protectDeviceOS - string (User's P1 Protect Activity City, used in notification template)
           5. custom_mfaDevices - array of string (To set, fetch and display user's registered MFA devices)
           6. custom_latestMFADevice - string (Recent MFA device registered by user, used in notification template)
           7. custom_savingsBalance - string (To fetch and update user's savings account balance after money transfer)
           8. custom_checkingBalance - string (To fetch and update user's checking account balance after money transfer)
           9. custom_currency - string (To fetch user's currency, to display after money transfer)
       -Configuration Check
           1. Set the environment variable p1-protect-analysis-required. If it is not set, the value specified in the code below for "protectAnalysisRequired" var will be used.
           2. Threat Detection Inner Journey (If Protect Analysis Is Required):
               a. Update the PingOne Worker Service ID (P1 Worker App), Risk Policy ID* in following nodes: (*Optional, if not provided default will be considered)
                   -- P1 Protect Initialize (1 instance)
                   -- P1 Protect Evaluation (2 instances)
           3. MFA Authenticaion Inner Journey (If "SMS", or "VOICE" are opted in below "allowedMFATyps" array):
               a. Update the required fields in:
                   -- Twilio Verify Lookup
                   -- Twilio Verify Sender
           4. Money Transfer Inner Journey (Configure PingOne Service in AM and set the authorization policies in PingOne)
               a. Update the PingOne Worker Service ID (P1 Worker App) in PingOne Authorize node
               b. Update the ENDPOINT ID(P1 Decision Endpoint) in PingOne Authorize node
               c. Edit Statement Codes as per your PingOne Authorize Policy in PingOne Authorize node
           5. Add Email Templates -  otp, suspiciousActivity, accountDisabled, newDeviceDetected etc.(refer documentation for sample formats)
           6. Money Transfer - Main Journey
               a. Update the Success URL node with preview URL of "Money Transfer - Inner Journey"
           7. Mark "Run journey for all users regardless of current session." as true for "Money Transfer - Main Journey" from settings.
*/


// Allowed MFA device types by the Admin
var allowedMFATypes = ["FIDO2", "OATH", "PUSH", "EMAIL", "SMS", "VOICE"];
nodeState.putShared("ciam_allowedMFATypes", allowedMFATypes);

// Check if Admin wants to enable/disable protectAnalysis
var protectAnalysisRequired = true;
nodeState.putShared("ciam_protectAnalysisRequired", protectAnalysisRequired);

// Check if Admin wants to allow OOB Magic Link as an MFA authentication method
var magicLinkEnabled = true;
nodeState.putShared("ciam_magicLinkEnabled", magicLinkEnabled);

outcome = "true";"
